title: Front seat harnesses and Devon interiors

posts.content:
Found this discussion...about Bally bus and harnesses...
Did you resolve the bench seat harness Devon interior in you bus Dave...
G

I'm working on it Graham. I have the front harnesses in but they need fettling.

I am currently fitting the ply floor in the back, then I can fit the floor tiles, then try out the Devon interior - at this point I'll need to work out how to do the seat belts - I have anchor points installed just not sure how to get through the wood with the belts...

Must crack on with that floor now.

Dave

Have a look at my Peebles thread...

viewtopic.php?f=8&t=74138&hilit=peebles&start=225

I cannot get the link right but on page 15 on here...
Not the same number on tapatalk..

I cut holes in the seat base frame with a drill and then fitted an escutcheon round the hole so the belt pulled on the mount below. From quickfitsbs. ..
I made a flying spur metal extension by the cooker.
All has worked well.
G
